alert.note: Alert for Collin; Denton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 22 at 3:18AM CST until February 22 at 3:45AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Denton County in north central Texas... Northwestern Collin County in north central Texas... * Until 345 AM CST. * At 318 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lake Dallas, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Plano, McKinney, Carrollton, Frisco, Denton, Lewisville, Allen, Flower Mound, Coppell, The Colony, Corinth, Highland Village, Lake Dallas, Lake Lewisville, Little Elm, Prosper, Celina, Hickory Creek, Double Oak and Shady Shores. This includes Interstate 35E between mile markers 448 and 461. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
